abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32672840, pmid32667967, pmid32668443, pmid32658335, pmid32658868, pmid32666395, pmid32667662, pmid32668041, pmid32672860, pmid32672789, pmid32667978, pmid32665227, pmid32657186, pmid32652766, pmid32668444, pmid32663415, pmid32671890, pmid32665420, pmid32668132, pmid32668494, pmid32668037, pmid32654557, pmid32660683, pmid32666917, pmid32668165, pmid32680882, pmid32665633, pmid32663045, pmid32662867
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.07.20
